item.title: Chicago’s Terra Foundation Turns into DEI Central
item.description: It uses its millions to inject race grievance into American art. Is this legal?

item.description: Ending three federal programs that serve radical progressive ideology would be a good start.

item.title: Which States Are Succeeding and Failing on Child-Care Regulation
item.description: Before turning to comprehensive overhauls of the child-care market, it’s time to look at which states are worth imitating.

item.title: The Supreme Court Should Rule That Reality Exists
